entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Add server interactivity benchmarks #54452
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add Data Protection Metrics #54451
  • Add new IHealthChecksBuilder extension method. #54449
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54447
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation do not work with .net8 or recent version of visual studio #54445
  • .net 8 Blazor WASM project AOT fails #54443
  • Issue when adding Blazor (server) to existing MVC app in .NET 8 #54438
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo throws exception when navigating in OnInitialized #54436
  • Installer of aspnetcore still contains wrong outdated .NET dotnet license information that makes it problematic to distribute #54434
  • Missleading unhandled exception error log #54433
  • Blazor SSR: Partially invalid UI Refresh after submitting EditForm #54432
  • Blazor InputSelect with multiple enabled throws NullRefException if nothing is selected #54431
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54430
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #54429
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes, mvc #54428
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json, plainTextSansFilter #54427
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #54426
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54425
  • Improve observability of Microsoft.IdentityModel logs #54424
  • Cannot trigger blazor events with elements #54423

Closed

  • PlatformNotSupportedException when navigating from Counter to Home page with multithreading enabled #54317
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, single_query #54402
  • Perf improvement: https #54408
  • IRazorViewEngine render view to html string, javascript tag is stripped out #53259
  • In the Blazor 8.0 project, using the RenderMode.InteractiveServer mode on both the HeadOutlet and Routes components caused occasional Javascript crashes. #54249

PullRequests

Created

  • Un-retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #54450
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54448
    area-blazor
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • [release/6.0] Create ci-public.yml #54442
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Create ci-public.yml #54441
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Create ci-public.yml #54440
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Create ci-public.yml #54439
    area-infrastructure
  • backport 8.0 - http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54437
    Servicing-consider, feature-httpsys

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `e1a38bc` #54435
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Enable publishing in VMR #54422
    area-infrastructure
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54368
    area-networking
  • Fallback to `IActivator.CreateInstance<IXmlDecryptor>` when `Type.GetType` fails #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, 8.0.x
